title: Authorization Listing - Positive
test_description: Authorization Listing - Positive: Grant catalog and schema permissions to TEMP_GROUP_OQ105 and verify user2 can list tables.

api_calls.name: get_user2_info
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const user2Name = responseData.userName || 'test-user'; const user2Id = responseData.id || null; return { ...currentVariables, user2_name: user2Name, user2_id: user2Id }; }

api_calls.name: get_group_id
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const resources = responseData.Resources || []; const groupId = resources.length > 0 ? resources[0].id : null; return { ...currentVariables, group_id: groupId }; }

api_calls.name: add_user_to_group
api_calls.post_processing: async function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const success = responseData && responseData.id; if (success) { await delay(60000); } return { ...currentVariables, add_user_success: success }; }

api_calls.name: poll_for_group_in_sql
api_calls.post_processing: async function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { logger.debug('Beginning polling for group availability in SQL engine'); let pollAttempts = 0; const maxAttempts = 60; const pollInterval = 5000; while (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { pollAttempts++; logger.debug('SQL group polling attempt ' + pollAttempts + ' of ' + maxAttempts); try { const response = await axios.post(`${currentVariables.workspace_url}/api/2.0/sql/statements`, { statement: 'SHOW PRINCIPALS', warehouse_id: currentVariables.warehouse_id }, { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${currentVariables.token}`, 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }); const success = response.data?.status?.state === 'SUCCEEDED'; if (success && response.data?.result?.data_array) { const principals = response.data.result.data_array; const groupFound = principals.some(principal => principal[0] === 'TEMP_OQ105'); if (groupFound) { logger.debug('Group TEMP_OQ105 found in SQL engine'); return { ...currentVariables, group_in_sql: true, sql_poll_attempts: pollAttempts }; } else { logger.debug('Group not found in SQL engine yet, waiting...'); if (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { await delay(pollInterval); } } } else { logger.debug('SHOW PRINCIPALS failed, waiting...'); if (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { await delay(pollInterval); } } } catch (error) { logger.error('SQL group polling error:', error.message); if (pollAttempts < maxAttempts) { await delay(pollInterval); } } } logger.debug('SQL group polling completed after ' + maxAttempts + ' attempts'); return { ...currentVariables, group_in_sql: false, sql_poll_attempts: maxAttempts, sql_polling_timeout: true }; }

api_calls.name: grant_catalog_permissions

payload.statement: GRANT USE CATALOG ON CATALOG ${catalog_name} TO TEMP_OQ105

api_calls.post_processing: async function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const success = responseData?.status?.state === 'SUCCEEDED'; if (success) { await delay(30000); } return { ...currentVariables, catalog_grant_success: success }; }

api_calls.name: grant_schema_permissions

payload.statement: GRANT USE SCHEMA ON SCHEMA ${catalog_name}.silver TO TEMP_OQ105

api_calls.post_processing: async function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const success = responseData?.status?.state === 'SUCCEEDED'; if (success) { await delay(30000); } return { ...currentVariables, schema_grant_success: success }; }

api_calls.name: test_list_tables
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const success = responseData?.status?.state === 'SUCCEEDED'; const tableCount = responseData?.result?.data_array?.length || 0; return { ...currentVariables, list_success: success, table_count: tableCount }; }
